product_name: Crag Survival Handbook: The Unspoken Rules of Climbing
long_description: With discussion of key skills, gear, and techniques, the. Author: Matt Samet. Softcover; 270 pages; black-and-white photographs. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2013. Author answers some of climbing's most perplexing questions, including:. "What if I have to go to the bathroom at the cliff?"; "Can I bring my dog?"; "When should I retire my rope?"; "What about oiling my cams?"; "How do I warm up my hands?". Handbook shares detailed advice from climbers Kevin Jorgeson, Justen Sjong, Beth Rodden and Tommy Caldwell. .
short_description: With discussion of key skills, gear, and techniques, the Crag Survival Handbook is longtime climber Matt Samet's personal handbook to becoming a responsible member of the climbing community.
